ModMetaData.name: LMC082s.大型太阳能板
ModMetaData.author: Thorbane, cucumpear
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html 英文名：Larger Solar Panel Adds a larger solar panel that better fits into wind farms. Originally created by Thorbane. Updated by cucumpear for Dellamorte78.n/n/Now (finally) with variants that will fit the new Wind turbine dimensions and even a tiled version (note that each tile is a separate building), and the tiles are a bit more expensive than "normal" solar gens. 增加了一个更大的太阳能电池板，更适合风力发电场。其变体将适合新的风力涡轮机尺寸，甚至是1X1版本（请注意，每个块是一个单独的建筑），并且1X1版本比“正常”太阳能发电机组更贵一些。 电力选项卡中添加1X1,5X5,5X7,6X7规格太阳能板。 时间戳：2019年4月27日 12:42:52 PS.看来现在大部分MOD都用supportedVersions了啊。
